post.author: Admin
post.title: Chaperones Needed for OMEA District Contest on March 10th and 11th
post.description:
Hello Band Families,
We are in need of 3 volunteers to chaperone for OMEA District Contest on March
post.content:
Hello Band Families,

We are in need of 3 volunteers to chaperone for OMEA District Contest on March 10th and 11th. 2 parents are needed to accompany the Symphonic Band on Friday, March 10th (report time is 5:45 pm) and 1 parent is needed to accompany Concert Band on Saturday, March 11th (report time is 12 noon). Please contact Mary Brewer at mbrewer0125@yahoo.com / (440)390-0345 if you are able to help.
